author: Special Correspondent
text:
Folk performances by traditional artistes marked the Pongal festival celebrations brought up by the State Tourism Department on the hill station of Yercaud on Saturday.

V. Sampath, District Collector, inaugurated the festival near the Boat House in Yercaud. Folk troupes presented special traditional performances. The 'thappattam' by the local troupe proved a major attraction.

Earlier, the employees of the State Tourism Department cooked sweet pongal. After offering special prayers, the same was distributed to a large number of tourists present on the occasion.

They also explained the importance of Pongal festival to the tourists, a majority of whom were from the neighbouring states.

V. Janarthanan, Tourism Officer in-charge, S. Annadurai, Chairman, Yercaud Panchayat Union, R. Murali, president of Yercaud Town Panchayat, participated in the celebrations.
title: It’s traditional games, folk arts all the way
